description: Drop in authentication including route protection and redirects.

scripts.check-git: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then echo 'You have uncommitted changes or untracked files.' && exit 1; fi
scripts.release: pnpm check-git && bumpp && turbo run release
scripts.release:next: pnpm check-git && bumpp --preid=next && turbo run release
scripts.release:cs: pnpm build && changeset pre enter next && changeset && changeset version && changeset publish && changeset pre exit && pnpm bump:next
